author: blumm
msg: Problem:  setPortletMode() at the ActionResponse fails, if the original
Request comes from an HTML Form.
The internal implementation is testing the HttpServletRequest.getContentType()
against the Portlet's mime types. In the case of an HTML form in IE6
getContentType() results in application/x-www-form-urlencoded.
This finally leads into a PortletModeException.
